author: xboard08
title: Small and Fun
review: Just picked this up yesterday at my local Toys R Us.  It's small but it is a fun little set and is a quick build.  I really like the green pieces.  The bucket arm goes up and down by turning a piece in the back of the tractor.  The front wheels do not turn left or right.

author: DrZeldenrustig
title: To cute!
review:
This is so cute! And it looks a bit like the 8284. So these 2 midels give a great display! I made some minor changes on the model, got rid of the frontbucket and added a harvester, to make it almost the same as the above mentioned model.
Please check my brickshelf (trough my profile) to view some pics i made.

After all this give so much value for money.
